data:
DTU Eligibility Criteria:
Inclusion Criteria (ALL must apply):
- Patients should receive at least two bronchodilator treatments and steroids prior to transfer to DTU
- FEV1 or PEFR 40 to 60% of predicted
- Stable vital signs
- Chest X-Ray at patient’s baseline 

Exclusion Criteria (ANY may apply):
- Altered mental status
- Vital signs outside inclusion criteria parameters
- Persistent use of accessory muscles
- Respiratory Rate greater than 40/min, shallow, laboured after initial treatment
- FEV1 or PEFT less than 40% of predicted after initial treatment
- Bedside spirometry indicates unclear diagnosis (i.e. mixed restrictive/obstructive diagnosis)
- SPO2 less than 90% after initial treatment
- Pneumonia
